gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: TL2HDOLS > TES/Aura L2 HDO Limb Special Observation

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: TES/Aura L2 HDO Limb Special Observation

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: The data used in this study were produced by the TES Science Team at the TES SIPS and archived at the Langley DAAC. See ProductionDateTime for Published date.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Atmospheric vertical profile estimates and associated errors (diagonals and covariance matrices), along with retrieved surface temperature, cloud effective optical depth, column estimates, quality flags, averaging kernels and a priori constraint vectors. Version Description: New O3 climatology data. Updated Methane climatology data. Updated max Optical Path Difference values. New Chi2 quality flag reported. New desert emissivity flag. Updated GMAO a priori values.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: Profiles can be compared to other measurements or models of this species or used as input to global chemical/dynamical models
